column3: str
The watcher would have you deal with the specters haunting the moon.
Speak with the faded spirit.
Speak with the dreaming spirit.
Speak with the forlorn spirit.
Speak with the somber spirit.
Approach the lustrous dog and follow its lead.
Speak with the temperamental spirit.
Speak with the temperamental spirit again.
Approach the lustrous dog and follow its lead.
Speak with the anguished spirit.
<hex:024804F2022303>From endless dreams...I awake...<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>You must confront those lost souls, yes, but you need not expel them by might of arms...<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>A feather-touch, a firm word─simple methods may send them away, faint echoes as they are.<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>Ware the strength of sentiment that drives them, however. Emotions that do not fade even with the passage of centuries...<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>And make haste. Though yet distant, unwelcome guests draw closer...<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>Of the six elemental brands, only those of levin and wind are intact.<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>If the other brands are not reforged, Zodiark may yet be freed.<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>Find the spirits of the sacrificed, and do what must be done...<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>Those halcyon days...<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>Was it truly...so long ago...?<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>We were happy... At peace with the star.<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>We nurtured it. Helped it grow. With our will, our creations...<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>We were the star's beating heart. Its life...<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>Every soul a drop of blood flowing through its veins...<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>To live. To learn, to create...to make better.<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>The star flourished...as did we.<hex:0248020103>
As the whispers die, the final spirit fades. No shadows of times long lost remain around the Drowning Brand.
An unusually lustrous dog is gazing at you with what seems to be fond anticipation.
It appears to be waiting for you to follow it.
<hex:024804F2022303>These...blackened memories...<hex:0248020103>
Follow the lustrous dog and try not to fall behind.
The dog silently regards the spirit that lurks near the brand.
Perhaps the dog will let you pet it once you have dealt with the lingering spirit.
<hex:024804F2022303>We and the star were fulfilled...<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>Wanted for naught, mourned for naught...<hex:0248020103>
The spirit's resentment takes form and lashes out!
<hex:024804F2022303>The Final Days taught us to fear a death forced upon us.<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>The injustice of duties and dreams left unfulfilled. The grief of unexpected partings...<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>Swift as darkness, cold as ash.<hex:0248020103>
<hex:024804F2022303>Such tragedy, yet no catharsis! Such truth, yet no consolation...<hex:0248020103>
As the whispers die, the spirit fades. All is silent and still around the Numbing Brand.
<hex:024804F2022303>Oh, great Zodiark!<hex:0248020103>
The lustrous dog is once again staring at you expectantly, and who are you to deny it? Follow and try not to fall behind.
The dog silently regards the shadow that lurks near the brand.
The dog continues to focus on the shadow, as if to say, “Stop petting me and get on with it, please.”
